rewrite1:
Please proceed with the following formatting adjustments:

For the third paragraph, assign it an Outline Level of 6. Ensure there is no spacing before the paragraph begins, align the text to be justified, and establish a Hanging indent of 1 character.

Regarding the text you've selected, set the Outline Level to 5. Increase the font size to 16 points, apply a wavy underline for emphasis, and adjust the right indent to 1 centimeter.

As for the seventh paragraph, switch the font to Calibri, update the Hanging indent to 6 points, set the font size to 16 points, and italicize the text to distinguish it.
rewrite2:
Revise the formatting for the third paragraph by selecting Outline Level 6, eliminating spacing before the paragraph, justifying the alignment, and applying a 1-character Hanging indent.

For the text you've highlighted, set the Outline Level to 5, increase the font size to 16 points, apply a wavy underline, and indent the right side by 1 centimeter.

Transform the seventh paragraph by switching the font to Calibri, adjusting the Hanging indent to 6 points, increasing the font size to 16 points, and italicizing the text.
rewrite3:
In the third paragraph, adjust the structure to Outline Level 6 and remove any space before the paragraph begins. Please ensure that the text is justified and set the indentation to a Hanging of 1 character.

For the selected text, elevate the Outline level to Level 5. Increase the font size to 16 points and apply a wave-style underline for emphasis. Additionally, alter the right indent setting to 1 cm for a cleaner margin.

Moving on to the seventh paragraph, switch the typeface to Calibri for a modern look. Modify the Hanging indentation to 6 points to enhance readability. Also, set the font size to 16 points and italicize the text to differentiate it from the surrounding content.
